title: Weddings and Aniversaries
description: We are committed to providing you with an experience beyond your expectations. Choose one of Mon Reve's event venue’s for your special day that will leave a lasting impression on your loved ones and your guests.

title: Birthdays and Baby Showers
description: No matter the year to be celebrated, Mon Reve will help you to coordinate a memorable birthday party.If you are planning to host a baby shower, a popular option is to book one of Mon Reve's event venue’s

title: Coporate Events and Many More
description: We cater to executive board meetings, strategy sessions, conferences, training sessions and workshops. Mon Reve is a quiet place that allows for uninterrupted strategic planning, creativity and new idea creation.
